page.title: 08The Police Station
page.content: The Police Station was built in 1975. It is open from 10.00 a.m. to 11.00 a.m. and from 6.30 p.m. to 7.30 p.m. There is one Sergeant and five constables. The patrol goes from Wickham Market to Rendham to Peasenhall to the Happy Eater Restaurant at Darsham. Prisoners are kept in a room with a hole in the door, so that you can see the whole room.Prisoners stay over night at Leiston. The magistrates court sits every Monday excepting Bank Holidays.The Juvenile court sits on Thursdays once a month. On a visit we were shown a room with a finger print set in it. We were shown how to take prints.
